attributes.action: raise the minimum height to 200ft minimum separation criteria of MOD aircraft.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The minimum separation criteria is 100ft which has caused 3 fatal accidents and numerous dangerous incidents when aircraft have flow over equestrian yards & riders. We aim to raise this minimum to 200ft to stop cruelty to animals and further serious accidents with riders, handler and horses.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "raise the minimum height to 200ft minimum separation criteria of MOD aircraft."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20306


Prime Minister's Office
